comments:
I am getting these messages in the Error.log.

After this eclipse was not clearing editor error marking
although there are no errors and none is listed in the Problems view.

Not sure what has caused this. Happens intermitently.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.resources 2 10035 2005-08-15 12:09:08.131
!MESSAGE A workspace crash was detected. The previous session did not exit normally.

This looks like a race condition in SWT.  The NPE is caused by the
Display.synchronizer field being null.  The NPE occurs right after doing a check
on the display's disposed flag.  When the display is disposed, the synchronizer
is set to null and the disposed flag is set after.  There is a brief period
while the display is being disposed that calling Display.asyncExec or syncExec
will cause this NPE.

Yes.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 45294 ***
